item.title: 印尼1月罕见出现预算缺口，支出激增26%
item.description: 印度尼西亚1月份出现罕见的预算赤字，此前政府兑现了加速支出以支持经济增长的承诺。【原文：Indonesia posted a rare budget shortfall in January after the government followed through on its pledge to accelerate spending to support economic growth.】

item.title: 贝莱德主动股票投资资深人士贝琳达·博阿将离职
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.）的贝琳达·博阿（Belinda Boa）——一位主动股票投资专家，也是该公司最高级别的女性高管之一——在她的认证领英个人资料中发布消息称，将在效力逾25年后离职。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s Belinda Boa, an active equity specialist and one of the firm’s most senior female executives, is leaving the company after over 25 years, according to a post on her verified LinkedIn profile.】

item.title: 贝恩公司称私募股权行业干旱期现已超过2008年金融危机
item.description: 私募股权行业连续第四年向投资者回报的利润减少，该行业持有3.8万亿美元未售资产，且为新基金筹集资金举步维艰。【原文：Private equity returned fewer profits to investors for a fourth straight year as the industry sat on $3.8 trillion of unsold assets and struggled to raise money for new funds.】

item.title: 卡塔尔主权财富基金投资高盛校友创立的信贷公司5C
item.description: 知情人士透露，卡塔尔规模达5800亿美元的主权财富基金正投资于一家由高盛集团前合伙人汤姆·康诺利和迈克尔·科斯特运营的私募信贷公司。【原文：Qatar’s $580 billion sovereign wealth fund is investing in a private credit firm run by former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. partners Tom Connolly and Michael Koester, according to people with knowledge with the matter.】

item.title: 报告称美国电池市场将逆势增长
item.description: 美国太阳能贸易组织预计，今年能源存储市场将增长21%，因电池需求将抵消政策阻力。【原文：A US solar trade group sees the energy storage market growing by 21% this year as demand for batteries outweighs policy headwinds.】

item.title: 卢拉访韩 韩国、巴西称两国关系迎来"新飞跃"
item.description: 韩国总统李在明与巴西总统路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦达成一系列新协议，涵盖关键矿产和人工智能等领域，同时推动扩大双边合作。这是21年来首位南美国家领导人对韩国进行国事访问。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung and Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva agreed a slew of new deals covering areas including critical minerals and artificial intelligence, while pushing to expand bilateral cooperation during the South American leader’s first state visit to South Korea in 21 years.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔据称下调了对庄信万丰催化剂的价格
item.description: 知情人士透露，霍尼韦尔国际公司已达成协议，将收购庄信万丰催化剂技术业务的价格下调，以挽救这笔交易。【原文：Honeywell International Inc. secured an agreement to cut the price of its acquisition of Johnson Matthey Plc’s Catalyst Technologies to salvage the deal, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 韩国央行预计芯片热潮将显著推高GDP增长
item.description: 韩国央行表示，得益于芯片热潮和强于预期的全球经济环境，该国以出口为导向的经济今年预计将实现"显著更高"的增长。【原文：South Korea’s export-driven economy is expected to post “significantly higher” growth this year compared to last, supported by a chip boom and a stronger-than-anticipated global backdrop, the central bank said.】

item.title: 美国银行预计更多企业将在菲律宾进行外汇风险对冲
item.description: 据美国银行称，随着全球不确定性加剧导致比索剧烈波动，菲律宾企业正加紧努力限制外汇风险。【原文：Companies in the Philippines are stepping up efforts to limit foreign exchange risks as global uncertainty fuels sharp swings in the peso, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 泰国出口创四年最大增幅 电子产品因人工智能热潮强劲增长
item.description: 电子产品出口增长与原材料及机械进口需求增强，推动泰国进出口额升至四年高位。该国正寻求与美国达成贸易协定。【原文：Outbound shipments of electronic products and stronger inbound demand for raw materials and machinery pushed Thailand’s exports and imports to their highest levels in four years, as the country seeks a trade agreement with the US.】

item.title: 据称KKR同意以13亿美元收购教育公司XCL
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.已同意收购XCL教育控股公司多数股权，该交易对这家东南亚教育运营商的估值约为13亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co. has agreed to buy a majority stake in XCL Education Holdings Pte in a deal that values the Southeast Asian school operator at about $1.3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度国家银行披露账户漏洞后，IDFC First Bank股价暴跌15%
item.description: 印度中型银行IDFC First Bank Ltd.的股价遭遇近六年最大跌幅，此前该行披露与某邦政府相关的账户存在涉嫌欺诈行为，并称哈里亚纳邦政府要求从该行撤资。【原文：IDFC First Bank Ltd. shares tumbled the most in nearly six years after the mid-sized Indian lender disclosed suspected fraud in accounts linked to a state government and said the Haryana state asked to pull funds from the bank.】

item.title: 美银、渣打银行在预算案后上调南非经济展望
item.description: 彭博社调查显示，财政部长伊诺克·戈东瓦纳本周将阐述南非公共财政的改善措施，这些举措为提升国家主权信用评级展望铺平道路。【原文：Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana will this week outline improvements in South Africa’s public finances that pave the way for a sovereign credit-rating outlook upgrade, a Bloomberg survey shows.】

item.title: 资产管理公司首次转为看涨澳元，这是自2024年末以来的首次
item.description: 机构投资者已首次在一年多时间里对澳元转为看涨，这主要受到澳大利亚储备银行采取鹰派立场以及美元疲软的双重推动。【原文：Institutional investors have turned long the Australian dollar for the first time in more than a year, driven by the combination of a hawkish Reserve Bank and weak greenback.】

item.title: SK海力士总裁承诺提升人工智能内存芯片产量
item.description: SK集团董事长崔泰源承诺将扩大人工智能内存芯片的产量，以满足全球数据中心建设激增带来的需求。【原文：Chairman Chey Tae-won of SK Hynix Inc.’s parent SK Group pledged to grow production of AI memory chips to meet a surge in demand from the global data center buildout.】

item.title: 新西兰联储的西尔克称澳大利亚在利率问题上处于"艰难处境"
item.description: 新西兰央行官员凯伦·西尔克表示，在疫情后通胀飙升之际，澳大利亚加息步伐慢于其他国家，使其陷入"艰难处境"，凸显出这两个邻国在经济和货币政策道路上的分歧。【原文：Australia is in a “difficult position” as it raised interest rates at a slower pace than peers following the post-pandemic surge in inflation, New Zealand central banker Karen Silk said, highlighting the divergent economic and monetary paths of the neighboring economies.】

item.title: 关税风波给印度带来不确定性，但消费必需品正悄然动荡
item.description: Centrum看好Dabur、Marico、雀巢、Britannia、HUL、Godrej Consumer和Emami。【原文：Centrum is bullish on Dabur, Marico, Nestle, Britannia, HUL, Godrej Consumer and Emami.】

item.title: 中国香港股市大涨，因美国法院推翻关税
item.description: 香港上市的中国股票在美股收盘后上涨，此前美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统的紧急关税令，中国成为对美出口关税下调的国家之一。【原文：Chinese stocks in Hong Kong rallied after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s emergency tariffs, putting China among the countries set to face lower duties on shipments to the US.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格因强劲暴风雪和液化天然气出口增加而飙升
item.description: 美国天然气价格上涨，因席卷东北部地区的一场强劲冬季风暴将推高供暖需求，同时液化天然气出口量也出现攀升。【原文：US natural gas prices rose as a powerful winter storm sweeping through the northeastern region was set to boost heating demand, while exports of LNG also climbed.】

item.title: 铜价上涨，因美国关税乱局推动美元下跌
item.description: 铜价连续第二日上涨，因美国关税政策的不确定性及其对更广泛市场的影响推动美元走低。【原文：Copper rose for a second day as uncertainty around US tariff policy and its impact on broader markets drove a decline in the dollar.】

item.title: 中部电力以逾10亿美元估值注资Continuum
item.description: 知情人士透露，中部电力公司正就收购印度Continuum Green Energy Ltd.的股权进行深入谈判，该公司的估值至少为10亿美元。【原文：Chubu Electric Power Co. is in advanced talks to buy a stake in India’s Continuum Green Energy Ltd. at a valuation of at least $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度卢比需要更强劲的外资流入以维持反弹势头
item.description: 卢比近期从历史低点反弹的势头可能只是昙花一现，分析师预测未来数月因外国资金流入不足，卢比将再度走弱。【原文：The rupee’s recent rebound from a record low may be fleeting, with analysts predicting renewed weakness in the months ahead on inadequate foreign inflows.】

item.title: 美国法院叫停特朗普关税后，中印等国成为赢家
item.description: 在命运的急转直下中，那些曾因美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的关税政策遭受重创的国家，如今却因最高法院推翻其紧急关税的裁决而成为最大赢家。【原文：In a swift reversal of fortunes, countries that had been hardest hit by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs have emerged as the biggest winners from the Supreme Court’s decision to strike down his emergency levies.】

item.title: 美元下跌，因交易员抛售美国资产以规避贸易政策风险
item.description: 美元兑所有主要货币汇率下跌，因特朗普总统的新关税计划引发了对全球最大经济体前景的担忧。【原文：The dollar dropped against every major currency as President Donald Trump’s fresh tariff plans raised concerns about the outlook for the world’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 印度官员惊慌失措，争分夺秒遏制全球领先的期权热潮
item.description: 2024年秋天，一位印度高级证券监管官员站在满屋子的基金经理和外国投资者面前，传达了一个不同寻常的信息：印度不愿成为全球最大的衍生品市场。【原文：In the autumn of 2024, a senior Indian securities regulator stood before a room full of money managers and foreign investors with an unusual message: India did not want to be the world’s largest derivatives market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将维持特朗普牛肉关税豁免，行业称
item.description: 作为美国最大的牛肉进口国之一，澳大利亚将继续免于特朗普总统的关税制度。【原文：Australia, one of the biggest foreign suppliers of beef to the US, will keep its exemptions from President Donald Trump’s tariff regime.】

item.title: 纽约市列车与航班受阻，全市严阵以待暴风雪来袭
item.description: 若你计划周一前往纽约市，除非是必要出行，否则最好还是待在家里。【原文：If you’re trying to get into New York City on Monday, unless it’s essential, you’re probably better off hunkering down at home.】

item.title: 英国寻求降低炼油厂碳成本以应对关停潮
item.description: 英国政府正在制定一项战略，以保护其剩余的炼油厂免受碳价上涨的影响，此前已有两家炼油厂关闭。【原文：The UK government is drawing up a strategy to protect its remaining oil refineries from rising carbon prices, after two sites closed.】

item.title: 英国毕业生职位首次跌破1万个，招聘网站Adzuna称
item.description: 英国职位空缺降至五年最低水平，毕业生职位数跌至历史新低，因1月份招聘活动放缓，劳动力市场担忧情绪日益加剧。【原文：UK job vacancies dropped to their lowest in five years and graduate posts fell to a record low as hiring weakened in January amid mounting concerns about the labor market.】

item.title: 韩国总统如何将本国市场打造成全球表现最佳的市场
item.description:
李在明正将自己作为股票交易员时经历的艰辛教训转化为推动集会的力量。【原文：

Lee Jae Myung is using hard lessons from his days as a stock trader to fuel a rally.

】
